DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness safety sublingual misoprostol 12,5 mcg vaginal misoprostol 25 mcg induction labour alive term fetus .
DOC.detailed_description: Several method induction labour available . However , effective less frequency adverse effect still unknown . Vaginal misoprostol use frequently induce labour route administration propose , oral sublingual . The purpose study compare effectiveness safety sublingual misoprostol 12,5 mcg vaginal misoprostol 25 mcg administration induction labour alive term fetus . A randomized control double-blind trial carry three hospital : Instituto de Medicina Integral Prof. Fernando Figueira , Universidade Federal Ceará Instituto de Saúde Elpídio de Almeida Maternidade da Universidade Federal de Campina Grande , March 2011 December 2011 . A total 150 patient must enrol . Inclusion criterion : ) indication labour induction ; b ) term pregnancy alive fetus ; Bishop score less six . Exclusion criterion : ) previous uterine scar ; b ) nonvertex presentation ; c ) non-reassuring fetal status ; ) fetal anomaly ; e ) fetal growth restriction ; f ) genital bleeding ; g ) tumor , malformation and/or ulcer vulva , perineum vagina . They randomize receive sublingual misoprostol 12,5 mcg vaginal placebo tablet sublingual placebo vaginal misoprostol 25 mcg tablet . Vaginal tablets 25mcg misoprostol placebo . Sublingual tablet 12,5mcg placebo . Vaginal misoprostol placebo tablet administer six hour maximum dose 200mcg eight tablet . Primary outcome frequency tachysystole . Secondary outcome vaginal delivery within 24 hour , hyperstimulation syndrome , cesarean section , severe neonatal morbidity perinatal death , serious maternal morbidity maternal death , need oxytocin augmentation labour , number misoprostol dos need bring labour , interval first dose labour first dose delivery , fail induction , uterine rupture , need labour analgesia , instrumental delivery , side effect , maternal death , meconium , non-reassuring fetal heart rate , Apgar score less seven 1st 5th minute , admission neonatal intensive care unit , neonatal encephalopaty , perinatal death woman satisfy .
DOC.criteria: Indication labour induction Term pregnancy alive fetus Bishop score less six Previous uterine scar Nonvertex presentation Nonreassuring fetal status Fetal anomaly Fetal growth restriction Genital bleeding Tumors , malformation and/or ulcer vulva , perineum vagina
